Key Match Events: The White Sox won the game 4-3 in the 10th inning with a walk-off single by Andrew Benintendi.
Post-Match Reflections: Andrew Benintendi stated, 'Guys aren't going to pack it in.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The White Sox avoided breaking the all-time loss mark for a second consecutive night.
Others: A fan held a sign saying he skipped school to watch the Sox win during the game.
